entry.title: Get Your Master´s Thesis Written! Grant
entry.summary:
The application period for "Get Your Master´s Thesis Written!" Grant is from October 31, 2017  9:00 until November 16, 2017  15:00.

The aim of the grant is to promote the finalizing of the Master’s thesis by providing an intensive thesis writing period at one of the field stations of the University in Hyytiälä, Kilpisjärvi, Lammi, Tvärminne or Värriö. The grant is meant for students who are close to the end of their thesis work. You can use the grant in January-June 2018.

entry.title: New application to help study planning
entry.summary:
Students will have access to a new study planning application during this academic year. The application is currently being tested in two Bachelor’s programmes.

The University will adopt a new study planning programme during this academic year. The application is part of a broader redesign of digital services. At first, students will be able to use the system to independently plan their studies. In the future, the degree programmes can use it as part of personal study plan guidance.

entry.title: Become a student representative at the University of Helsinki!
entry.summary: The Student Union will recruit new student representatives for all faculties and the University Collegium this fall. Student representatives make sure that students’ interests won’t get trampled on when making decisions which concern studies and student life. They voice students’ opinions in meetings, advance and defend issues that are important to students – put university democracy into action.
